(24) T [bìx xià y] cái lái.
(s)he must fall rain CAI come

(25) [T bìx qù dàshgun], cái néng shnqng qinzhèng.
(s)he must go embassy can apply.for visa
CAI
`Only if (s)he goes to the embassy can she apply for a visa.'/'She must go to the em-
bassy to be able to apply for a visa.'

(26) [Yào dng nmen jio-le jièshàofèi yhòu], cái ky gi nmen npái.
it.is.necessary wait you pay-ASP commission after CAI can for you arrange

you.'/`Only after you have paid the commission can things be arranged for you.'
